enb_long_title: First Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
sentences: The second session of the AGBM will be held on 30 October to 3 November 1995 in Geneva.

The AGBM will consider the following inputs from the Secretariat: a compilation of submissions from Parties; the first edition of an annotated compilation of information relevant to the BM process; lists of issues identified by Parties; and a synthesized listing of policies and measures identified in Annex I Parties` national communications.
